entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Outlook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Outlook 12:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:24 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to light snow and ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 12:24 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:24 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 12:24 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
